ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: And( Not(ISPICKVAL($User.Team__c, '')), OR( RW_Project__c = 'Runwal Gardens', RW_Project__c = 'Runwal MyCity' ), $Label.Disable_all_validations_from_lead == "false" /*Added by Prashant to control disabling all validations together*/ )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Leads cannot be created for Gardens and My City projects
